review_title: Very positive experience - ICMPD Brussels Office
pros: Great office and colleagues in Brussels, flexible work environment, good staff care.
cons: Low promotion and career development opportunities. Atmosphere and quality not equal between projects, management not always clear and sometimes disorganized.

pros: People are nice to work with, it offers great flexibility since COVID in terms of working from home arrangements, there is good work-life balance
